body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Start a duel with a random color(s) deck
2. Click "Generate Deck" What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Get a new random color(s) deck
What you get: Always a random deck of the same color(s) you got at the start.

e.g. you got a blue deck and every click on generate deck will get you a new blue deck. Why not a white or red one? The same goes for random colored decks of 2 or 3 colors. You will always get the same colors. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.27 on WinXP SP3
